description.short:
A structure describing attributes of a video format.

An ofVideoFormat is used to describe the size, pixel format and frame rates offered by a video device.

See also: ofVideoDevice

methods.short: A list of framerates for this video format in frames per second.

methods.name: height
methods.short: The height of the video format in pixels.

methods.name: pixelFormat
methods.short: The pixel format of the video format.

methods.name: width
methods.short: The width of the video format in pixels.

#class ofVideoFormat

##InlineDescription

A structure describing attributes of a video format.

An ofVideoFormat is used to describe the size, pixel format and frame rates offered by a video device.

See also: ofVideoDevice

##InlineDescription

A structure describing attributes of a video format.

An ofVideoFormat is used to describe the size, pixel format and frame rates
offered by a video device.


**See also**: ofVideoDevice
